{pages:['# Sometimes the
# golems get a bit
# confused between
# different data types
# but we can use that
# to our advantage.

let array = [1,2,3]

if array > 2
  print("Array is longer than 2")
end

', 'let string = "Hello, world!"

if string < 100
  print("String is short enough")
end']}
